name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Pavolia Reine, Gawr Gura, IRyS, and Calliope Mori talk about Reine's 3D showcase, Reine attempts a bridge pose, and introduces her mascot 'Tatang'.
Pavolia Reine performs a cover of 'DISCOTHEQUE'.

subtitles.original: Surprised.
subtitles.english: Surprised.

subtitles.original: I want to see you do a bridge.
subtitles.english: I want to see you do a bridge.

subtitles.original: A bridge?
subtitles.english: A bridge?

subtitles.original: Yes.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: A bridge like "kayang" desu ka?
subtitles.english: A bridge like "kayang" (bridge pose)?

subtitles.original: Kayang lagi, emang ngerti?
subtitles.english: Bridge again, do they even understand?

subtitles.original: You have to like, lie down first? This is dangerous.
subtitles.english: You have to like, lie down first? This is dangerous.

subtitles.original: How limber are you?
subtitles.english: How limber are you?

subtitles.original: I don't know!
subtitles.english: I don't know!

subtitles.original: (Grunts)
subtitles.english: (Grunts)

subtitles.original: Cameraman!
subtitles.english: Cameraman!

subtitles.original: Nice! So limber.
subtitles.english: Nice! So limber.

subtitles.original: Cameraman was not really keyed in on the memo there.
subtitles.english: Cameraman was not really keyed in on the memo there.

subtitles.original: Damn it!
subtitles.english: Damn it!

subtitles.original: No, no more rebroadcast. Sorry, sorry.
subtitles.english: No, no more rebroadcast. Sorry, sorry.

subtitles.original: We'll get them next time.
subtitles.english: We'll get them next time.

subtitles.original: I gotta show you something.
subtitles.english: I gotta show you something.

subtitles.original: Do you know who this is?
subtitles.english: Do you know who this is?

subtitles.original: Show it, show it.
subtitles.english: Show it, show it.

subtitles.original: Mister... Tamboree!
subtitles.english: Mister... Tamboree!

subtitles.original: Tatang!
subtitles.english: Tatang!

subtitles.original: Big old Tatang.
subtitles.english: Big old Tatang.

subtitles.original: Tatang! It looks like a post office.
subtitles.english: Tatang! It looks like a post office.

subtitles.original: My beloved... My beloved Tatang.
subtitles.english: My beloved... My beloved Tatang.

subtitles.original: And I want to... say a little bit of something.
subtitles.english: And I want to... say a little bit of something.

subtitles.original: This Tatang can grow big.
subtitles.english: This Tatang can grow big.

subtitles.original: You know Tatang is small, right?
subtitles.english: You know Tatang is small, right?

subtitles.original: Like your chest?
subtitles.english: Like your chest?

subtitles.original: Hmm? Eh? Eh?
subtitles.english: Hmm? Eh? Eh?

subtitles.original: No, no, no. Reine's Tatangs are not small.
subtitles.english: No, no, no. Reine's Tatangs are not small.

subtitles.original: Yes. So like if you feel like...
subtitles.english: Yes. So like if you feel like...

subtitles.original: Wait, I'm just going to demonstrate it to you.
subtitles.english: Wait, I'm just going to demonstrate it to you.

subtitles.original: What? They're not. Of course they're not.
subtitles.english: What? They're not. Of course they're not.

subtitles.original: I mean, you just said they can get bigger?
subtitles.english: I mean, you just said they can get bigger?

subtitles.original: Oh broke. Tatang's going to get wet.
subtitles.english: Oh broke. Tatang's going to get wet.

subtitles.original: With this tea! Oh no!
subtitles.english: With this tea! Oh no!

subtitles.original: With this tea, you can...
subtitles.english: With this tea, you can...

subtitles.original: (Gulp sounds) Oh God! I see...
subtitles.english: (Gulp sounds) Oh God! I see...

subtitles.original: Oh! Whoa! It's like a sponge!
subtitles.english: Oh! Whoa! It's like a sponge!

subtitles.original: And he's peeing it out right away! It's going right through him!
subtitles.english: And he's peeing it out right away! It's going right through him!

subtitles.original: It's...
subtitles.english: It's...

subtitles.original: Big Tatang! Big Tatang!
subtitles.english: Big Tatang! Big Tatang!

subtitles.original: So if you guys feel like you want to, maybe for example...
subtitles.english: So if you guys feel like you want to, maybe for example...

subtitles.original: ...grow bigger and stronger...
subtitles.english: ...grow bigger and stronger...

subtitles.original: ...like have a bigger heart or something...
subtitles.english: ...like have a bigger heart or something...

subtitles.original: IRyS needs that. Yeah.
subtitles.english: IRyS needs that. Yeah.

subtitles.original: You guys can call me and order this tea from me.
subtitles.english: You guys can call me and order this tea from me.

subtitles.original: Everybody join the "Royalty".
subtitles.english: Everybody join the "Royalty".

subtitles.original: So if you know, if the tofu has a little problem or something...
subtitles.english: So if you know, if the tofu has a little problem or something...

subtitles.original: Whoa, yeah. I don't specifically need anything like that.
subtitles.english: Whoa, yeah. I don't specifically need anything like that.

subtitles.original: But yeah, I'm just saying... I'm not mentioning any names.
subtitles.english: But yeah, I'm just saying... I'm not mentioning any names.

subtitles.original: Will it make me grow bigger everywhere?
subtitles.english: Will it make me grow bigger everywhere?

subtitles.original: Everywhere? Of course! Voluptuous Gura coming up soon.
subtitles.english: Everywhere? Of course! Voluptuous Gura coming up soon.

subtitles.original: If you take a bath with it every single day, then maybe...
subtitles.english: If you take a bath with it every single day, then maybe...

subtitles.original: Oh! I'm going to take a lot of tea.
subtitles.english: Oh! I'm going to take a lot of tea.

subtitles.original: Sounds like my mom telling me to drink milk every day of my childhood life.
subtitles.english: Sounds like my mom telling me to drink milk every day of my childhood life.

subtitles.original: Exactly! It's better! Even better!
subtitles.english: Exactly! It's better! Even better!

subtitles.original: Oops, where do I put this?
subtitles.english: Oops, where do I put this?

subtitles.original: Sign me up.
subtitles.english: Sign me up.

subtitles.original: I don't know what I want to grow, but it sounds cool.
subtitles.english: I don't know what I want to grow, but it sounds cool.

subtitles.original: We need stuff like that in our lives.
subtitles.english: We need stuff like that in our lives.

subtitles.original: Of course.
subtitles.english: Of course.

subtitles.original: You know. Okay, thank you so much for coming to the call.
subtitles.english: You know. Okay, thank you so much for coming to the call.

subtitles.original: Congratulations on your 3D!
subtitles.english: Congratulations on your 3D!

subtitles.original: You look amazing! You look great!
subtitles.english: You look amazing! You look great!

subtitles.original: You look awesome! You look divine!
subtitles.english: You look awesome! You look divine!

subtitles.original: Beautiful! Keep doing your best!
subtitles.english: Beautiful! Keep doing your best!

subtitles.original: Yeah, thank you!
subtitles.english: Yeah, thank you!

subtitles.original: Bye bye! Mata ne!
subtitles.english: Bye bye! See you later!

subtitles.original: Bye!
subtitles.english: Bye!

subtitles.original: Yeah, so just call me guys if you need that, yeah.
subtitles.english: Yeah, so just call me guys if you need that, yeah.

subtitles.original: Anyways, that was great! I'm so happy so many people came to see me.
subtitles.english: Anyways, that was great! I'm so happy so many people came to see me.

subtitles.original: But I'm not done singing yet. There's still more.
subtitles.english: But I'm not done singing yet. There's still more.

subtitles.original: So mada utaitai kara... Eh, fukanjatta.
subtitles.english: So since I still want to sing... Oops, I slipped up.

subtitles.original: Mada utaitai kara, I'm going to sing someplace else maybe.
subtitles.english: Since I still want to sing, I'm going to sing someplace else maybe.

subtitles.original: I want to sing in a place...
subtitles.english: I want to sing in a place...

subtitles.original: ...where I can sing as much as I like.
subtitles.english: ...where I can sing as much as I like.

subtitles.original: And then... So let's... Ido!
subtitles.english: And then... So let's... Move!

subtitles.original: Chu-ru chu-ru chu-ru pa-ya-pa
subtitles.english: Chu-ru chu-ru chu-ru pa-ya-pa

subtitles.original: Sweetie darling 踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Sweetie darling, let's dance

subtitles.english: Into a bursting Cupid

subtitles.english: I want to color it

subtitles.english: The face reflected is a surreal day
